section.title: dataRefEnd
section.para: Original data reference - holds the identifier of the <data> element that contains the original data for the end marker of a given inline code.
Value description: An [XML Schema Datatypes] NMTOKEN that must be the value of the id attribute of one of the <data> element listed in the same <unit> element.
section.programlisting: <unit id="1"> <originalData> <data id="d1"><EM></data> <data id="d2"></EM></data> </originalData> <segment> <source><pc id="1" dataRefStart="d1" dataRefEnd="d2"> Efficiency</pc> is the operative word here.</source> <target><pc id="1" dataRefStart="d1" dataRefEnd="d2"> Efficacité</pc> est le mot clé ici.</target> </segment> </unit>
section.para: The example above shows two <pc> elements with their original data stored outside the content, in two <data> elements.
